page.title: 20THE BOLLIN VALLEY PROJECT.
page.content: The{River Bollin}rises in the Pennines and flows through Macclesfield and Wilmslow to the Project Area. The Project maintains a twenty mile stretch between the two National Trust country parks of Dunham Hall and Styal Mill. Of interest is { {Ross Mill,}in the S.East corner of this Survey area, which contains woodland walks, riverside picnic sites and pony trail. Marsh, beech woods and ponds support abundant wild life. The Project was established in l972 to provide opportunities for recreation whilst protecting farming interests; co_operation in managing the land. In charge of this project are a group of{ {Countryside Rangers}who act on ideas of groups like the Countryside Comm. and mediate with farmers. They maintain paths, plant trees and stop trespass: educate countryside users.
